title: Arms Manufacturer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Sell a gun to a non-guild player during the night. Gain 1 profit.
- Buy out insurance on a target during the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players may use the gun to shoot a target during the night instead of their normal action, dealing a basic attack to them.
- When a target w/ bought-out insurance is attacked by a non-guild member, gain 2 Profit.

fields.name: Item: Tank:
fields.value:
- Cost 8
- Uses 3
- Crew Tank: Deal a Powerful Attack to a chosen target instead of your normal action. Gain Unstoppable Defense for the night.
